title: How to Say Goodnight to a Guy over Text

steps.content: ”Just wanted to say goodnight. Sending you 🤗😘😴" Reader Poll: We asked 404 wikiHow readers how often they text their boyfriend goodnight, and 61% of them agreed that they text every night, no matter what . [Take Poll]
